## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
3D Microscope System

### Reference Number
WS4465174612

### Tender Closing Date
27 May 2024, 02:00 PM ET

### Procurement Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier for a 3D Microscope System for the Department of National Defence (DND). The procurement is being conducted through the CanadaBuys portal and is restricted to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) with PSPC for laboratory equipment.

### Key Procurement Requirements
- Procurement Category: Goods and Services
- Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal Against Supply Arrangement
- Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Project Details
- Starting Date: 30 April 2024
- Expected End Date: 28 July 2025
- Delivery Location: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information
- Buyer: Wijaya Putri, Yessica Karnali, SPAC/PSPC
- E-mail: yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Query and Feedback
Inquiries regarding this tender must be made through the CanadaBuys portal. Only suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria outlined above will be issued a formal tender document. All ineligible submissions will be rejected.

### Change History
- Date of Amendment: 16 April 2024
- Amendment Number: 0

### Notice URL
The tender notice can be accessed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19421110?extsite=MTk0MjExMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Availability of Tender Documents
Tender documents will only be available on the CanadaBuys portal for an additional 40 calendar days. It is the supplier’s responsibility to ensure they are eligible for this procurement and follow the instructions outlined in the tender documents. [1]
